2. Analyze each noun or noun phrase to determine if it represents a property value.

* change
* number of thienyl spacers
* this system
* aggregation behaviour
* polymer main chains

* number of thienyl spacers - This term refers to a quantifiable attribute of the system, which can be considered a property value.
* this system - This term refers to the object or subject to which the property value (number of thienyl spacers) applies, but it is not a property value itself.
* aggregation behaviour - This term represents the behavior or tendency of the polymer main chains, which can be considered a property value.
* polymer main chains - This term refers to the structural components of the system, but it is not a property value itself.

So, the "Property Value" entities in the given paragraph are:

1. The number of thienyl spacers
2. The aggregation behavior of the polymer main chains
